channel.title: Skill cape emotes don't work? Please help! (REWARED)!

item.title: Skill cape emotes don't work? Please help! (REWARED)!
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

What do you mean your trying to code this?
This looks more like ripping from another source to me
most likely Project 69 source.

Anyways I fixed it for you:

[code]public void capeEmote() {

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14094) { //Client hp cape
stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
stillgfx(333, absY, absX);
stillgfx(377, absY, absX);
stillgfx(560, absY, absX);
stillgfx(469, absY, absX);
txt4 = “An hitpoints skill cape!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;

   }
   if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14095) { //Client hp cape
          stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
          stillgfx(333, absY, absX);

stillgfx(377, absY, absX);
stillgfx(560, absY, absX);
stillgfx(469, absY, absX);

stillgfx(559, absY, absX);

}[/code]

If your emote button is wrong
choose a different case, I used this one:

case 161: //Cape Emotes capeEmote(); break;

Also go and find this: yours may look different than mine:
update();
sendFrame126(“Yes”, 180);//frist emote slot
sendFrame126(“Train”,181);
sendFrame126(“Varr”, 178);
sendFrame126(“Fally”,175);
sendFrame126(“Lumby”,177);
sendFrame126("@red@S@gre@C",182);

Use the last one in place of your other 182 ^^
Compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill cape emotes don't work? Please help! (REWARED)!
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Cause it’s leeched from what I made, someone junked it up with text string, which wouldn’t do anything to it really except make it weird. Your graphics packet probably doesn’t exist or is lacking, try it on another source then if it word copy that gfx packet and handler to yours.

Read full topic

Can anybody help me add them?
